评论详情: This is a beautiful blouse!  The colors are amazing!  Love the sleeves!  Very  comfortable!
Loved the material and true to size!
Absolutely love this. Fits perfect and well made. Will buy more!
I saw this top on Instagram and it look really great on the influencer it’s a beautiful floral print but it just didn’t look good on me so I returned it

The shirt was delivered this morning.  I couldn't wait to try it on. It's a perfect size.  I bought a XXL.  Fits perfectly.  The length is great, long enough to cover my waist. I love the ruffles on the wrists. It's a bright colorful print. You won't be sorry with your purchase.
I really like this shirt - it’s fits perfectly, material is soft, and the colors match the picture online.  A great price too!
Love this too!  Looks exactly like the picture and great quality for the money.

评论概述: LOVE this feminine top recently moved!
评论详情: i recently moved from San Diego to Savannah GA - I know! Huge move, different cultures.  My San Diego look is very tailored but Savannah women wear a lot of color and more femininely.  This top was one of my first forays into trying to be a little more Savannah.  Very flowy and I love the banded cuffs.  Fully lined, looks exactly like the photo and that’s about the most I can tolerate as far as flowers 😊 I really love it and look for ways to wear it.  I recently wore it with leggings to do open house, and t looks amazing with jeans. I got the small, fits perfectly on my 5’3 135 lb 36D frame with broad shoulders.  Get it!  I will probably buy other colors.
Washes beautifully. Comfortable to wear. Received many compliments.

This blouse has a pretty floral print and great detailing on the shoulders and sleeves. It runs true to size through the shoulders and chest, so the L worked perfectly for me! I’m 5’3” and like tops a bit shorter, so I took the length up to suit my preference. However, if left longer, the blouse would work well with a skinny jean/dress pant and It’s also cute tucked in. The fabric texture is not super soft, but it’s as expected.
I love it.I am glad that this kind of tops are in fashion again,it looks like a very good quality and the colors are exactly like in the picture.The fit is great.I will buy again..
Buying clothes online, always is a gamble, but was very pleased with the pattern fabric and fit of this top. I would recommend this product.
Adorable shirt.  Flattering, true to size and can be worn causal or for work.  Love it.  Will buy more in other colors.
Perfect fit, flowey, and flattering
very pretty
I love the fit of this top, but the color is wrong - this is brown, not red.  Will have to return this one.
Beautiful color palette and pattern. Elegant silky feel - a must have! Runs a bit wide but looks very nice tucked in :)

This is an excellent work shirt. It is not see through (something that getting harder to find!), dressy enough for work, casual enough for comfort, and long sleeves for air conditioned buildings but has the stretchy at the wrists so it doesn't get in the way when typing or writing. Great shirt!

This top is really pretty. It's made of good quality fabric that drapes nicely on your body. It's comfortable and runs true-to-size. I love the way the sleeve lays - it's a really pretty effect that adds something extra to this top. I washed and dried it, and it still wears the same as before! I really like it!
Love the colors - true to size - very comfortable

The front is much shorter than the back. The fabric is really nice and print a color is good. But the front is so short couldn’t tuck it in. It was odd loooking.  Size was pretty accurate except for length.

This shirt has a nice pattern, is thin but not see through, and the gathering at the end of the sleeves is very flattering. I really like the cut and design of this shirt, very flattering all around. Oversized but not too long and can be worn untucked.

评论概述: IF I Could Give This Blouse 10 Stars I Would! So I Did! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
评论详情: Better than described and photographed. The colors all match my monitor but you just don't get the full effect of these vivid colors until you have this blouse in your hands! It is magnificent! Too many colors to count! The smocked cuffs are too wonderful and very trendy right now! They are so feminine! This 100% Polyester can be worn year round! This is a very good grade of polyester, not as thin as some! Made very well with a classic style makes this a really good value at this low price! Hope my honest review helps you! 🙏
Love the fit, material and print of this blouse.

This blouse is perfect for work. I love the colors and the style. The fabric is nice and it's thin/see through. It has a pop of color and looks just like the amazon photos. I wear a size small and I feel this runs on the large side, but the shirt has that looser fit style. So if you're in between sizes or prefer a slimmer fit, go down a size. Overall, I love this shirt.
Wore this tonight to my open house at school and got compliments all night. It’s super cute and flattering. It also is light and wearable when it’s on the hotter side.
So cute! I love the 70s aesthetic and this shirt delivers. It fits comfortably and pairs well with dress pants or more casual pants.

This top is generously sized. Worn untucked it skims my body and is casually flattering. The color combo is nice. Oft times long sleeved tops are down to mid hand or longer on me but the elastic at the wrists makes these okay for me as well as for ladies with arm lengths more proportionate. It is nice to see the varied colors/patterns that this shirt is available in. No special laundry care needed.
Pretty blouse, airy material

I ABSOLUTELY love this blouse! The sleeves hit at my wrist and the blouse is so flattering on. I have an apple shaped body which can sometimes be challenging to dress, and I like that this hangs well and doesn't cling on to the tummy when wearing. Really great item!

I love everything about this shirt.  The XXL fits my size 20.  The colors of orange, coral and pink in the top I choose are luscious.  It has lovely smocked, elastic cuffs and the shoulders are smocked as well with gathers across the back at the yoke, giving it beautiful detailing. The material is chiffon- like and maybe, in some colors, a tiny bit see-through.  This can go business to casual and is very flattering.  I will try it with a belt over with jeans. Looking forward to a little cooler weather but since the material is a little thin I could certainly see it as year round here in the Deep South.

评论概述: Nice chiffon type fabric, well made
评论详情: This is a very pretty blouse. Well made and I like the fabric. It has a chiffon type feel, very light and airy but not see through. I love the full sleeves, they elevate the style of this top to something more fun and stylish. This is going to work with a lot of outfits, very versatile. My issue is with the sizing. I normally wear a large in order to have room in the chest area, but I probably should have gotten a medium in this. The body of the blouse is very big, I will have to take this in several inches in order to wear it untucked.

It fits perfect with room to spare. The material is lightweight enough to wear in the summer. I love the elastic on the cuff, which keep the sleeves pushed up, if you so desire. I feel dressy and feminine in this elegant top. I would recommend it.

I LOVE this top by Dokotoo!  I now have several tops/blouses by them and love all of them!  This one is beautiful!  I normally am a solid color top person since it's close to my head where I see it all day and go with patterns on my lower half.  I decided to branch out when I saw this and am so glad that I did.  It fits beautifully and is so elegant looking on.  I normally go for blues, blacks, reds, or purples but I love the colors in this top!  It is well made and I will be wearing it often!

I'm absolutely  loving this Blouse. The fabric is made of polyester which is soft and lightweight that make it comfortable to wear all day long. The button up V neck design give it a stylish and dressy look that perfect for both work and casual look. The relaxed fit and flow design make it easy to pair with anything for skinny jeans and dress pants. The long sleeve elastic smocked cuffs are a nice touch adding a bit of elegance to the overall look. The machine washable fabric is also a big plus for easy care.

评论概述: Great add to Fall Wardrobe! Lighweight
评论详情: This top is very lightweight so great for material for those women who have hot flashes. Length of the sleeve was perfect. Loved the design of the shirt.

I now I like the pattern because I have another one just like it, except it's short sleeves.  I think the daisies on black is a classic, fun look.This fit true to size.  I'm a typical XL and it fits perfectly.  I'm not crazy about the fabric because I find it a bit scratchy but after a few washings it might be fine.It is well sewn, no loose threads.  No bad smells.  I think I will get a lot of wear out of it come fall/winter

This blouse is really nice. Fits true to size, ADHD has a good length. Sleeves are full length, and are smocked at the wrist. It also has this same smock detail at the shoulder (see close-up pic on this review). This shirt is cool and flowy fabric. No noticeable stitching issues. Wrinkles from shipping came out in the wash (I chose to dry flat). Happy with this top, and absolutely love the retro print!

I normally wear XL, but ordered L in this blouse and it fits very nicely. It is pretty comfortable and could be paired with dressy or casual skirts and pants. It is very thin when held up in the light, but is not obviously thin when worn. I was concerned it would require a camisole underneath, but it really doesn't. It seems to be well made and is worth the price for sure. For reference I am 5'7" 174 lbs. 38DD
My wife loves this blouse Beautiful Colors Made Well Good Quality Comfortable

Colors are beautiful and as pictured.  Sizing is true to size. The material is thin and flowy; seams are well stitched.  The cut is flattering and the smocking on the sleeves is not too tight.  This blouse can be dressed up or down - great addition to any wardrobe.

This is a great summer blouse and fits well, not too tight or clingy. The floral print/color are exactly as pictured. The quality and stitching is good and its flattering/comfortable to wear. The fabric is durable, soft, breathable, doesn't wrinkle easily and not see-thru. Washes well and looks cute with jeans/pants/skirt. Like it and recommend
This is a very feminine floral blouse.  The material is flowy and does not cling.  The sizing is true to size for me.  I love the smocked cuffs - elevates the look in my opinion.  Great choice!

This shirt is a chiffon material which I didn’t expect. That means that there will be absolutely. I stretch whatsoever to the shirt so you must get the right size. I sized up and it’s comfortable.  I didn’t expect for there to be just a few button at the top instead of going down the entire front of the shirt, but I don’t mind that.  The print is like I expected, but maybe just a tad brighter and more vibrant. It came wrinkled but I expect a steaming would resolve that.

I ordered the Dokotoo Women's Casual V-neck in size XL for my wife who is 5'5" and considers herself an apple shape.  The shirt arrived in a plastic bag, and was unwrinkled when we opened it.  The shirt had no off odors or chemical smell.The shirt fit is a bit oversized, the smocking at the top shoulder and cuffs helps with this, but if you are between sizes, consider sizing down.  My wife should have picked a large.The shirt is well-made, looks like the photo, has a pullover style with 3 functioning buttons. The V-neck style would be flattering on most body types.  My wife likes the bold print, the color combination works on the black background.  This would be a good shirt for the office or lunch with friends.  I deducted a star for the fit, I think it's a bit too big to be an XL.

评论概述: Very cute, colorful and lightweight top
评论详情: The colors on this shirt are eye catching. The colors look like the picture from the listing. The material does not have a lot of stretch. I thought the smocking might bother me but it doesn't. The seam in the underarm area is a little stiff but hopefully it will soften after it has been washed a couple times. I can't wait to wear the shirt with some white jeans.

评论概述: Simple, nice blouse. May be too casual for work
评论详情: I bought this top for work but I’m  not sure I can dress this up enough. It fits fine (ordered my normal size - large) and the material is a thin gauzy material. Not see-through thin in the dark color I purchased; not sure if a lighter color would be see-through. It hits me at a weird place - right across the middle of my bum and so I wish it were just a tad longer.
